div.p: See documents for Important Information from the Mental Health Department...
ALL EVENTS ARE CANCELLED AT THIS TIME.

March 30, 2020
Today, Governor Tom Wolf announced that all K-12 Pennsylvania schools will remain closed until further notice. Southeastern Greene School District will implement our continuity of education plan. Our district plan is to begin instruction for students on Monday, March 30th, with instructional packets and online resources that can be completed at home with teacher support through emails and phone calls. Students should keep all packets and materials at home until further notice. We will provide more information about returning the instructional packets at a later date.
Thank you for your patience and cooperation during this difficult time!
